sim: Single SIM (Nano-SIM) or Hybrid Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by)
display_c:
- HDR10 compliant
  - Triluminos display
  - X-Reality Engine
card_slot: microSD, up to 400 GB (uses SIM 2 slot) - dual SIM model only
sound_c:
- 24-bit/192kHz audio
  - Dynamic vibration system

wlan: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, DLNA, hotspot
gps: Yes, with A-GPS, GLONASS, BDS, GALILEO, QZSS
messaging: SMS(threaded view), MMS, Email, IM, Push Email
features_c:
- Fast battery charging (Quick Charge 3.0)
  - Qi wireless charging
  - Xvid/MP4/H.265 player
  - MP3/eAAC+/WAV/Flac player
  - Document viewer
  - Photo/video editor
sensors: Fingerprint (rear-mounted), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, barometer, compass, color spectrum
cpu: Octa-core (4x2.7 GHz Kryo 385 Gold & 4x1.7 GHz Kryo 385 Silver)
body_c: - IP65/IP68 certified - dust/water proof (up to 1.5m for 30 mins)
primary_: Dual: 19 MP (f/1.8, 25mm, 1/2.3", 1.22Âµm) + 12 MP B/W (f/1.6, 1/2.3", 1.55Âµm), 5-axis gyro EIS, predictive phase detection and laser autofocus, LED flash
features: Geo-tagging, touch focus, face/smile detection, panorama, HDR
